word:
WHEN CRITICS POINTED OUT THIS FEATURE OF HER WORK AS A REASON FOR QUESTIONING THE GIFT WHICH HAD ENABLED HER TO WRITE, SHE PAID LITTLE ATTENTION TO IT. LATER ON, WHEN COMPLAINT WAS MADE THAT THIS WAS AN INJUSTICE TO OTHER PUBLISHERS AND WRITERS, SHE MADE A DECIDED CHANGE--A 
                                                                           461
CHANGE WHICH YOU ARE FAMILIAR WITH.
